alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fleming County through 645 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cowan, or 11 miles west of Flemingsburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cowan around 630 PM EDT. Flemingsburg, Elizaville, Craintown, Pecks Ridge, Nepton and Tilton around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ewing and Flemingsburg Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
